name: The Black
description: The Black is a strong 90% indica bred by BC Bud Depot. This strain dates back to the late 1980's, originating in California and on Vancouver Island in Canada. As characteristic of many indicas, this strain is optimally used for pain relief and as a sleeping aid. The Black was named after its unique growering characteristics: frosty leaves turn from a dark purple to black during flowering, reaching maturity between 8 to 10 weeks.
descriptionPlain: The Black is a strong 90% indica bred by BC Bud Depot. This strain dates back to the late 1980's, originating in California and on Vancouver Island in Canada. As characteristic of many indicas, this strain is optimally used for pain relief and as a sleeping aid. The Black was named after its unique growering characteristics: frosty leaves turn from a dark purple to black during flowering, reaching maturity between 8 to 10 weeks.

highlightedReviews.text: THE BLACK AKA-Blaxout I don't care one anyone says my dad helped with this flower in the 1970s my father worked for the breeder dj short. before moving back home to Hawaii my dad took 1600 seeds with him 500 of them being the black. this flower IF grown out door is VERY STRONG, IF grown indoor this FLOWER WILL put you right to sleep if not to sleep you'll be melting into your bed lol. if you find this flower consider yourself LUCKY this flower is as rare as Tora bora another strong indica.     20/10 <--------"that's right 20"
I love it! It helps me wind down nicely for bed and super relaxing.

articles.title: New Strains Alert: Atmosphere, The Black, Blue Dot, OG #18, and Watermelon
articles.author: Kayla Williams
articles.text:
Relaxation is the name of the game this week! These five new strains promise to cut the edge, and each offer additional effects and flavors to fit your occasion. If you're looking for an active, social strain, we have two OG Kush predecessor hybrids for you to explore. If it's sleep you're after, these two heavy-hitting indicas may provide satiety. And if you're chasing that heady buzz, there is a single, dynamic sativa with your name on it. Enjoy!
1. Atmosphere
Characteristics of Atmosphere:

Balanced hybrid
A cross between White Widow and OG Kush
Piney, citrus aroma
Delivers euphoric, creative, relaxing effects

2. The Black
Characteristics of The Black:

90% indica
Bred by BC Bud Depot
Useful for pain relief and insomnia
Flowers in 8 to 10 weeks

3. Blue Dot
Characteristics of Blue Dot:

80% sativa
Originated in Sonoma, CA
Blend of White Widow, Skunk, Big Bud, and Northern Lights #5
Sweet, hashish flavor
Flowers in 9 to 10 weeks

4. OG #18
Characteristics of OG #18:

Indica-dominant hybrid
Daughter of OG Kush
Diesel, kush flavor with sour undertones
Can bring long-lasting sedative, relaxing effects

5. Watermelon
Characteristics of Watermelon:

80% indica
Sleep aid and appetite stimulant
Fruity, watermelon flavor with hints of grape
Flowers between 8 to 9 weeks
